title: Digital Design Lab
description: Design and implementation of digital systems, including a team  design project.  CAD tools, project design methodologies, logic synthesis, and assembly language programming.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (ECE 2020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 2030 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and (ECE 2035 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 2036 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 1372 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) or CS 2110 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
